title: Arcade Sona
body: Is the Arcade Sona skin ever going to get its arcade particles back?

replies.body:
The answer is no.

This issue has been raised multiple times already (ever since her stupid rework) and I think it was fixed once, only for the next patch to break it again.  Or perhaps it was never fixed.


TL;DR - no, buy the Sona ultimate skin brought to you buy Riot "#bigplays" Game$$

I doubt it, Riot is trying really hard to kill her off.  Made obvious by the nerfs made back in August and the repeated nerfs they're doing now.  Meanwhile: Nami, Soraka, Thresh, Janna and Braum...

Riot's Sona-hating bias is clear as day.
Riot cares about $ and $ only, In other words she's on the list about 130 champions down the list. When sona sales die they will fix it.
